Text: The right to know the categories and specific pieces of personal information we collect, use, disclose, and sell about you, the categories of sources from which we collected your personal information, our purposes for collecting or selling your personal information, the categories of your personal information that we have either sold or disclosed for a business purpose, and the categories of third parties with which we have shared personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: The right to know the categories and specific pieces of personal information we collect, use, disclose, and sell about you, the categories of sources from which we collected your personal information, our purposes for collecting or selling your personal information, the categories of your personal information that we have either sold or disclosed for a business purpose, and the categories of third parties with which we have shared personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text: The right to opt out of our sale of your personal information. You can choose to opt-out of the sale of your personal information and data, opt out of processing your data for targeted advertising, and limit the use of your sensitive information. This is not related to your credit report, and will not affect your credit score.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: The right to request that we delete the personal information we have collected directly from you.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: The right not to receive discriminatory treatment for the exercise of the privacy rights conferred by the CCPA.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: In order to exercise your rights through our online portal, please click the link below.\n\nOnline Portal
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text:
Experian may periodically change its privacy policies as new products and services are offered or as its existing products and services evolve to meet customer needs. Privacy policies are typically dated to reflect the most recent update.

Recent updates to any Experian U.S. privacy policy will be posted to this section.
